text: 19 March 2025 : Wednesday Mar 2025 : Wednesday See More Photos of:  Book Hey everyone! In this episode, I dive into Dolores Cannon’s incredible book, “The Three Waves of Volunteers for a New Earth.” Filmed in the beautiful Queenstown, I share my admiration for Cannon and her impactful work that resonates with so many who feel isolated and different. Here are some key points I cover: Introduction to Dolores Cannon: I talk about my personal connection to her and how her writings have influenced my journey. The Three Waves of Volunteers: I explore how the first, second, and third waves of volunteers are here to help elevate human consciousness. Children as the Third Wave: I highlight the amazing contributions of the new generation and their role in shaping the future. Past Life Regressions: I delve into fascinating case studies that reveal detailed past life experiences. Karma and Life Lessons: I discuss how our past actions influence our current lives and the lessons we learn along the way. Awakening of Humanity: I share my thoughts on the critical point we’re reaching in global awakening towards love and peace. Connection to Nature: I emphasize the importance of maintaining a high vibration through our connection with nature and surrounding ourselves with positive influences. I wrap up by reflecting on the interconnectedness of life and our purpose on Earth, offering a hopeful perspective for the future. I hope you find this discussion inspiring!
html:
19

March 2025 : Wednesday Mar 2025 : Wednesday

See More Photos of:  Book

Hey everyone! In this episode, I dive into Dolores Cannon’s incredible book, “The Three Waves of Volunteers for a New Earth.” Filmed in the beautiful Queenstown, I share my admiration for Cannon and her impactful work that resonates with so many who feel isolated and different.

Here are some key points I cover:

Introduction to Dolores Cannon: I talk about my personal connection to her and how her writings have influenced my journey.

The Three Waves of Volunteers: I explore how the first, second, and third waves of volunteers are here to help elevate human consciousness.

Children as the Third Wave: I highlight the amazing contributions of the new generation and their role in shaping the future.

Past Life Regressions: I delve into fascinating case studies that reveal detailed past life experiences.
Karma and Life Lessons: I discuss how our past actions influence our current lives and the lessons we learn along the way.

Awakening of Humanity: I share my thoughts on the critical point we’re reaching in global awakening towards love and peace.

Connection to Nature: I emphasize the importance of maintaining a high vibration through our connection with nature and surrounding ourselves with positive influences.

I wrap up by reflecting on the interconnectedness of life and our purpose on Earth, offering a hopeful perspective for the future. I hope you find this discussion inspiring!
